Articles.Content: Something that plots vessel acceleration over time or part temperature over time and presents this data in a graph would be cool.

Basically, a flight data recorder, right?  I think this would be a very cool addition, and not just limited to acceleration and temperature data, but all sorts of parameters and inputs would be great to have recorded... even played back!

8 hours ago, Wanderhoof said:

Basically, a flight data recorder, right?  I think this would be a very cool addition, and not just limited to acceleration and temperature data, but all sorts of parameters and inputs would be great to have recorded... even played back!

 

On 10/15/2016 at 0:51 PM, Jonfliesgoats said:

Something that plots vessel acceleration over time or part temperature over time and presents this data in a graph would be cool.  

I'm in!!!

and being able to export it to excel would be neat!
It would save me so much trouble to be able to export data from a flight recorder directly to excel!
MechJeb has a flight recorder that does vehicle related stats.
